issue.title: [C++] Cleanup Parquet Arrow Schema code
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9264](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9264). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Preceding ARROW-8493 there is some cleanup.  Variable renaming, using Result instead of output parameter and moving code from reader_internal.cc to schema.cc

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9264?focusedCommentId=17149028) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7578
